Warehouses API

Endpoint: /api/warehouses/

Methods: GET, POST, PUT, PATCH, DELETE

⚠️ Authentication Required

All requests to this endpoint must include a valid JWT token in the Authorization header:

        Authorization: Bearer

See Authentication for details.

Model Fields

  • code (string, unique)
  • name (string)
  • address (string)
  • created_at, updated_at (ISO 8601)

Example Request (POST)

POST /api/warehouses/ HTTP/1.1
Content-Type: application/json

{
    "code": "WH001",
    "name": "Main Warehouse",
    "address": "123 Storage St, City"
}

Example Response (201 Created)

{
    "id": 1,
    "code": "WH001",
    "name": "Main Warehouse",
    "address": "123 Storage St, City",
    "created_at": "2025-04-05T12:34:56Z",
    "updated_at": "2025-04-05T12:34:56Z"
}

Error Responses

  • 400 Bad Request - Missing or duplicate code.
  • 404 Not Found - Warehouse not found in GET/PUT/PATCH/DELETE.
